name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Two Way Voice for Bing AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension for Bing AI Chat allows you to ask using voice and listen to response.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the convenience of voice interactions with Bing AI.  This extension for Bing AI website allows you to have conversations using your voice. Ask questions using your voice and you can listen to response, making it easy and convenient to get the information you need hands-free. Perfect for anyone who prefers to talk to Bing AI using their voice. It can be your voice assistant. Get answers, discuss ideas, and explore topics with ease. 

Simply start the conversation mode. The extension will automatically manage turns between asking question and listening to the response once you've started the conversation mode. There are three conversation modes available:

1. Two-way conversation (Default) - You can ask question using voice and Bing AI will respond with voice.
2. You talk & Bing AI text response - You can ask question using voice and it will respond with text. Useful if you want to just read.
3. You type & Bing AI voice response - You can ask question using typing and it will respond with voice. Useful if you want to listen on headphone and cannot speak out loud in quite place.

The extension enables voice-based questions in various languages like Nepali, Chinese, and Korean. For instance, speaking in Nepali or Chinese generates the respective characters. Our extension utilizes your browser's built-in voice-to-text API, which may automatically download additional voices for text-to-speech. Download times vary based on your system and network conditions. Voice-to-text accuracy and performance rely on your machine's resources, which can decrease during high CPU usage.

Please contact us if you've any questions or feedback.

Disclaimer: This extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Microsoft Inc in any way. "Bing AI" is a trademark of Microsoft Inc, and its use is subject to Microsoft's permission. Any references are solely for the purpose of describing the functionality of this extension. For official information, please visit Microsoft's website.
